Headline: හාමුදුරුවන්ගෙ ලයිට් බිලට කංචන හැංගිලා (සිකුරාදා කාටූන්)

comments.comment: කාංචනගේ ඔළුව පලන්න බලාගෙන තමයි අපිත් ඉන්නෙ.
ලයිට් බිලයි, පොල්ලකුයි අරගෙන එනකොට කාංචන සෝලා පැනල් එකක් අල්ලන් ඉන්නේ බේරෙන්න.

Now the parents are struggling even to provide basics like foods school books and school bags etc etc. to their children.One school bus for a school can not provide transport facilities to all or at least a significant section of the students in the particular school.Then it must for the children to go on trips and for other similar purposes.when providing basics to their children is a big issue for the parents, donating a bus is a stupid idea.Sajith if in any case he is elected president he will be worse than even GOTABAYA.
